description.@en: Be at war with your vices, at peace with your neighbors and let every new year find you a better person.

system.notes:
Frontier Trait

Professions of this Archetype typically live on the fringes of urban society and in the frontier lands. They make trade off the bounty the land affords them, hiring themselves out as surveyors and protecting others.

effect.@en: Immediately after you suffer Damage from a melee or ranged weapon, spend a Coin to ignore it.
